accelerator-1.description: Use a spray coater to spray on the cargo can speed up the rate of manufacturing.
accelerator-1.name: Accelerant Mk.I

accelerator-2.description: Based on Mk.I, the raw material formula is upgraded, which can further increase the rate of manufacturing.
accelerator-2.name: Accelerant Mk.II

accelerator-3.description: Maximize the manufacturing speed with the newly upgraded raw material formula, and the requirements for the entire production line are also higher.
accelerator-3.name: Accelerant Mk.III

accumulator.description: Power storage facility. When the electricity of the power grid is surplus, it will automatically store the excess power. When the power supply is insufficient, it will automatically discharge to maintain the operation of the facilities.
accumulator.name: Accumulator

accumulator-full.description: The accumulator in the fully charged state. When the power is insufficient, can be constructed as a facility to automatically discharge, or it can be placed in an energy exchanger to release electrical energy.
accumulator-full.name: Accumulator(full)

anti-matter.description: It is obtained by inverting photons in a critical state. When the positive and antimatter meet, they will annihilate each other and generate huge energy.
anti-matter.name: Antimatter

antimatter-energy-fuel.description: Antimatter can be made into a more stable fuel rod by using the strong restraint of annihilation constraint sphere. It will be safer in this way.
antimatter-energy-fuel.name: Antimatter fuel rod

assembler-1.description: The basic assembler. Can process iron and copper ingots into more advanced products.
assembler-1.name: Assembling machine Mk.I

assembler-2.description: The production speed has been greatly improved, and items can be processed more quickly.
assembler-2.name: Assembling machine Mk.II

assembler-3.description: The production speed is maximized, and a reasonable combination of conveyor belts and sorters of different speeds can effectively avoid the empty assembler or product blockage.
assembler-3.name: Assembling machine Mk.III

bamboo-crystal.description: It will only be a rare occurrence on the living planet that once existed widely in the ocean with a depth of 100,000 meters. After the marine life on these planets die, and the corpse sinks to the bottom of the sea, it can directly mineralize with seawater under the deep sea high pressure. If there is a stable, smooth, slow, and hot ocean current at this time, spiniform stalagmite crystal may form under the blow of the ocean current.
bamboo-crystal.name: Spiniform stalagmite crystal

belt-1.description: We need automation! Conveyor belts are the most basic part of production automation. They can transport cargo from one place to another.
belt-1.name: Conveyor belt MK.I

belt-2.description: An upgraded conveyor belt, with higher speed and consequently higher throughput.
belt-2.name: Conveyor belt MK.II

belt-3.description: Maximize the speed and throughput of transporting cargo.
belt-3.name: Conveyor belt MK.III

c-matrix.description: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, can be used to unlock more advanced new structural materials.
c-matrix.name: Structure matrix

casimir-crystal.description: Use a strong electric field to fix the charged particles, and the Coulomb repulsion between the particles will spontaneously form a spatial ring-shaped ion crystal. After applying a weak static magnetic field, the zero-point energy of the particles inside the crystal is excited, producing an obvious Casimir effect.
casimir-crystal.name: Casimir crystal

charging-pole.description: Remote transmission facility. Can consume electricity from the power grid to charge the mecha.
charging-pole.name: Wireless power tower

chemical-plant.description: Chemical facility. Can process the primary products of Crude oil into more advanced chemical products.
chemical-plant.name: Chemical plant

circuit-board.description: The most basic electrical component. It is very versatile.
circuit-board.name: Circuit board

coal-ore.description: A solid combustible mineral. It's gradually formed by plants through complex biochemical, physical and chemical changes. It is raw material for smelting and chemical production as well as an energy source.
coal-ore.name: Coal

copper-ore.description: Smelted directly into copper ingots. Obtained by gathering copper vein.
copper-ore.name: Copper ore

copper-plate.description: Basic raw material. Used to produce various copper components.
copper-plate.name: Copper ingot

crystal-rubber.description: A high-grade chemical product. Used to produce higher strength crystals with a crystal structure. It can also be directly gathered from rare organic crystal vein.
crystal-rubber.name: Organic crystal

deuterium.description: A stable isotope of hydrogen. Rarely exists under natural conditions. Most of them come from the reprocessing of hydrogen and the collection from the Gas giant.
deuterium.name: Deuterium

deuterium-energy-fuel.description: Under a magnetic field, it is possible to make deuterium into deuteron fuel rods as a better source of energy. These fuel rods are often used in small fusion systems.
deuterium-energy-fuel.name: Deuteron fuel rod

diamond.description: Diamond is obtained by using strong pressure and heat to change the structure of graphite. It is a very hard crystal that not only retains the parallel hexagonal lattice of graphite but also forms a cubic hexagonal lattice.
diamond.name: Diamond

diamond-ore.description: Rare ore. Directly crystallized from Kimberlite magma under CO₂ rich conditions, and diamond can be obtained by further smelting.
diamond-ore.name: Kimberlite ore

dyson-sphere-component.description: Use a small carrier rocket to transport them to the planned Dyson sphere to form the nodes and frames of the Dyson sphere.
dyson-sphere-component.name: Dyson sphere component

e-matrix.description: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, the emergence of the energy matrix has largely promoted the further development of technology.
e-matrix.name: Energy matrix

electric-motor.description: The fundamental power system component. It can accelerate mechanical operation.
electric-motor.name: Electric motor

em-rail-ejector.description: Launch a large amount of solar sails into the orbit of the system's star to form a Dyson Swarm.
em-rail-ejector.name: EM-Rail Ejector

energy-exchanger.description: The power conversion facility. Can not only store the surplus electric energy in the power grid into an empty accumulator to make a full accumulator; it can also release the electric energy stored in the full accumulator.
energy-exchanger.name: Energy exchanger

fractal-silica.description: It is a rare natural silicon ore with a unique geometric fractal structure. After the single crystal grows to a certain size, the branches of smaller silicon crystals grow from the matrix. Crystal fractal is a natural purification mechanism. The more fractal algebra, the higher the purity. Among them, fractal silicon with more than six generations can directly be used as the raw material for making lattice silicon.
fractal-silica.name: Fractal silicon

fractionator.description: Taking advantage of the high vapor pressure ratio of liquid hydrogen and liquid deuterium at a certain temperature, deuterium is fractionated from liquid hydrogen with a certain separation efficiency. Use a conveyor belt to introduce hydrogen from one side, after fractional distillation, export from the other side, and export the deuterium from the front port.
fractionator.name: Fractionator

frame-material.description: A new type of high-strength lightweight structure. Can withstand the strong gravitational force of stars compared with traditional structural materials, and is very suitable for manufacturing Dyson sphere components.
frame-material.name: Frame material

fuel-plant.description: Facility that uses combustible materials (such as coal) as fuel to generate electrical energy. Energy loss between the energy value of the provided fuel and the produced electricity is expected.
fuel-plant.name: Thermal power plant

fuel-thruster.description: Can provide power for logistics drone.
fuel-thruster.name: Thruster

fusion-capacitor.description: It is a crucial component of artificial stars to confine the annihilation reaction within the sphere to obtain stable and controllable energy output.
fusion-capacitor.name: Annihilation constraint sphere

fusion-power-station.description: Under the action of a high-strength, high-density magnetic field, this facility converts the huge energy released by the controlled fusion reaction of Deuteron fuel rods into electrical energy.
fusion-power-station.name: Mini fusion power plant

fusion-reactor.description: "All you have to do is let the positive and negative proton beams quietly cross the magnetic field from both ends into the constraint sphere, nice'n easy!" This scaled-down version of the system is known as the Mini-sun.
fusion-reactor.name: Artificial star

g-matrix.description: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, to some extent, unifies quantum field theory and general relativity.
g-matrix.name: Gravity matrix

gas-hydrate.description: Rare ore. Has cage-like microstructure which is similar to ice-like white solid, and covalent bonds in a critical state allow it to be used to produce graphene more efficiently.
gas-hydrate.name: Fire ice

gear-wheel.description: Standard component is used for transmission and other functions and is also widely used in various mechanical structures.
gear-wheel.name: Gear

glass.description: An amorphous optical medium material with an irregular structure, can be used to make various optical components such as prisms and lenses. And can also be used to make facilities and buildings.
glass.name: Glass

graphene.description: The double-layer graphenes will form a complex repeating structure, a superlattice by rotating when stacking one layer of graphene on top of another. After rotating to a certain Magic Angle, double-layered graphene will gain superconductive properties. Graphene has become a new type of nano-superconducting material.
graphene.name: Graphene

graphite.description: Purify raw coal to obtain graphite, a more usable form of carbon. You can further compact graphite to create crystal diamonds that have more advanced applications.
graphite.name: Energetic graphite

grating-ore.description: Rare ore. With naturally formed grooves distributed on the surface, is used to produce precision optical components and high-power exciters.
grating-ore.name: Optical grating crystal

gravity-lens.description: A piece of neutron star material that has been encapsulated after processing, its twisted and powerful gravitational field is shielded in a container. Usually, we will use it to process and change the spatial structure, but we can expect some one use it to refract the sunlight and ignite fire.
gravity-lens.name: Graviton lens

hadron-collider.description: When the two beams of particles are continuously accelerated to a certain intensity and energy, they will collide, and new particles can be obtained. It is usually used to stably produce deuterium and antimatter, but will consume a lot of energy.
hadron-collider.name: Miniature particle collider

hydrogen.description: The most abundant element in the universe is the lightest gas.
hydrogen.name: Hydrogen

hydrogen-energy-fuel.description: With further development of cryo-technology hydrogen can be liquefied to make fuel rods for higher combustion efficiency. These higher energy Fuel Rods can greatly increase the mecha's fuel power generation.
hydrogen-energy-fuel.name: Hydrogen fuel rod

hyper-magnetism-ring.description: Super magnetic field generating device. Generated super-strong magnetic field can directly act on the atomic scale, causing the distortion of the material lattice, thereby preparing high-performance materials and devices.
hyper-magnetism-ring.name: Super-magnetic ring

i-matrix.description: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, the level of informatization will largely affect the production efficiency of the base.
i-matrix.name: Information matrix

inserter-1.description: Transport cargo from conveyor belts into facilities or between facilities, can install filter to filter the cargo.
inserter-1.name: Sorter MK.I

inserter-3.description: In order to maximize the speed of sorting cargo, we can upgrade technology to increase the number of cargo that can be transported by the sorter MK.III each time.
inserter-3.name: Sorter MK.III

interstellar-logistic-station.description: The magnificent space elevator realizes more convenient transportation of materials between planets. It can connect factories on different planets to form a gigantic industrial empire.
interstellar-logistic-station.name: Interstellar Logistics Station

ion-thruster.description: It is an upgraded version of the thruster that can power the logistics vessel.
ion-thruster.name: Reinforced thruster

iron-ore.description: Used to smelt iron ingots and magnets. Obtained by gathering iron vein.
iron-ore.name: Iron ore

iron-plate.description: Basic raw material. Used to produce various iron components.
iron-plate.name: Iron ingot

lab.description: Connector to the CenterBrain. Used to both produce matrices and research technologies. The more matrix labs, the faster production or research speed can progress.
lab.name: Matrix lab

logistic-drone.description: It can dynamically balance the supply and demand in the planetary logistics system, but it will only work for the logistics station it belongs to.
logistic-drone.name: Logistics drone

logistic-station.description:
The hub of the planetary logistics system. Logistics drones will automatically transport cargo between stations when you set the corresponding items for supply and demand. 
(Only enables delivery around its own planet.)
logistic-station.name: Planetary Logistics Station

logistic-vessel.description: It can dynamically balance the supply and demand of cargo between planets, and consumes space warper can activate warp.
logistic-vessel.name: Logistics vessel

mag-turbine.description: Make objects levitate against gravity, usually used to make more advanced magnetic field generators.
mag-turbine.name: Electromagnetic turbine

magnet.description: Basic magnetic material. Obtained by smelting iron ore directly.
magnet.name: Magnet

magnetism-wire.description: The most basic electromagnetic component. It is very functional.
magnetism-wire.name: Magnetic coil

micro-component.description: Microcrystalline component is the basis for processors to achieve high-speed computing functions. It requires carving and processing city-like three-dimensional nanostructures on high-purity silicon wafers to make.
micro-component.name: Microcrystalline component

mining-drill.description: The more veins covered by the mining machine, the faster the mining speed, and the same vein can be covered by multiple mining rings, but the more mining rings covered, the faster the consumption.
mining-drill.name: Mining machine

mono-mag-ore.description: Rare ore, Has a pyrochlore lattice. After applying a magnetic field, we can affect the string's symmetry and direction, reduce the string network's density, and separating magnetic monopoles.
mono-mag-ore.name: Unipolar magnet

nanotube.description: The weight is very light with a perfectly connected hexagonal structure, has extremely high strength and strong resistance to deformation, and is usually used to manufacture high-efficiency devices.
nanotube.name: Carbon nanotube

oil.description: Fossil formed by marine organisms can gather as a liquid mineral deposit. It contains the chemical energy marine organisms accumulated during their lifetime. Can as fuel or chemical raw material.
oil.name: Crude oil

oil-extractor.description: When plasma is used to extract oil from the Crude oil seep, the extraction speed will be different for different Crude oil seep.
oil-extractor.name: Oil extractor

oil-refinery.description: The extracted crude oil is further refined to obtain refined oil and hydrogen.
oil-refinery.name: Oil refinery

orbital-collector.description: Used to collect the resources of the gas giants, it needs to consume the collected fuel materials to maintain the energy required to work in orbit.
orbital-collector.name: Orbital Collector

orbital-substation.description: Wide-area power distribution facility. Provides longer range power transmission and a larger power supply area.
orbital-substation.name: Satellite substation

partical-capacitor.description: While firmly binding the particles, it can guide particles to show some specific properties.
partical-capacitor.name: Particle container

particle-wide-band.description: Control the particles to maintain a certain regularity, which greatly improves the printing speed of the particles.
particle-wide-band.name: Particle broadband

photo-shifter.description: The surface of the prism is cut into nano-gratings and then reassembled. After continuously absorbing multiple low-energy photons will emit a high-energy photon under a combination of specific structures. The magic is that the natural Optical grating crystal in the cluster can directly do this.
photo-shifter.name: Photon combiner

photon-capacitor-full.description: A critical state photon. Can be converted into antimatter and hydrogen under the action of a super magnetic field.
photon-capacitor-full.name: Critical photon

plane-filter.description: Studying the Rabi oscillation to obtain the law of the probability change with time during the evolution of the particle wave function over time, it can be artificially interfered with during the quantum transition so that the quantum jumps in the expected direction.
plane-filter.name: Plane filter

plant-fuel.description: Compared with wood, although the energy is lower, it is easier to obtain.
plant-fuel.name: Plant fuel

plasma-generator.description: The plasma generated by the high-power exciter can be used to extract and refine crude oil, and can also be used to make wireless power tower for remote power transmission and charge mecha.
plasma-generator.name: Plasma exciter

plastic.description: Primary chemical product. Has a wide range of uses and is usually used to make more advanced chemical products.
plastic.name: Plastic

prism.description: A polyhedron surrounded by two intersecting glass planes, can split light or disperse light beams. It is a key component for producing more precise optical instruments.
prism.name: Prism

processor.description: Large-scale integrated circuit device. The application of semiconductor materials make it better in processing data and controlling the processing process.
processor.name: Processor

quantum-processor.description: With powerful computing power and ultra-fast computing speed, it can warn whether the quantum transition will cause errors. And timely prevent its transition by reversing the transition process that may cause errors.
quantum-processor.name: Quantum chip

ray-receiver.description: Receives high-energy rays transmitted from the Dyson swarm or Dyson sphere. The received energy can be directly outputted to the power grid, or stored as photons in a critical state.
ray-receiver.name: Ray receiver

refined-oil.description: The primary product of crude oil refining. A chemical fuel, can be used to produce various chemical products.
refined-oil.name: Refined oil

rocket.description: The delivery vehicle of Dyson sphere components. If you want to speed up the construction, you need to send more rockets.
rocket.name: Small carrier rocket

silicium-high-purity.description: Obtain a spectrally pure silicon crystal after the High-purity silicon is melted and passed through a strong electric field at a certain speed, which can further remove the ionic impurities dissolved therein. Crystal silicon has almost no crystal defects and is mainly used to make some ultra-high-precision optical instruments.
silicium-high-purity.name: Crystal silicon

silicium-ore.description: Obtained by gathering from silicon veins. It is usually used to make high-purity silicon crystals.
silicium-ore.name: Silicon ore

silicium-single-crystal.description: After the crude silicon is melted and recrystallized, it can obtain analytically pure silicon crystals. The photovoltaic materials and semiconductor components made can fit a variety of needs.
silicium-single-crystal.name: High-purity silicon

smelter-1.description: High temperature arc smelting can smelt ores and metals, and also be used for purification and crystal smelting.
smelter-1.name: Arc Smelter

smelter-2.description: When monopoles pass through the Plane Filter, they produce a quantum effect of self-organizing and can generate a thermodynamic negative temperature flow. Using this technology, the process of ores smelting or purification can be greatly accelerated.
smelter-2.name: Plane Smelter

solar-collector.description: Use the EM-Rail Ejector to launch a large number of solar sails to form Dyson swarm, which can more effectively obtain the radiant energy of stars.
solar-collector.name: Solar sail

solar-panel.description: Directly generate electricity using sunlight, and the actual generation capacity is related to the planet's solar energy ratio. Not working at night, use accumulators can store excess energy during the day.
solar-panel.name: Solar panel

space-warper.description:
Consumables. Used to activate warp of mecha and logistics vessels.
Use the <color="#FD965ECC">CapsLock</color> key to start the warp engine.
space-warper.name: Space warper

splitter-4dir.description: Used to distribute cargo to different conveyor belts, or to balance multiple conveyor belts. Can set the filter and priority on any one port.
splitter-4dir.name: Splitter

spray-coater.description: Spraying Accelerants on cargo can speed up the manufacturing.
spray-coater.name: Spray coater

steel-plate.description: Under strict and controllable temperature conditions, using iron ingots as raw material for further smelting, the crystal form of the material is improved so that it has better mechanical properties.
steel-plate.name: Steel

stone-brick.description: A common material. Obtained from smelting stone ores, is usually used as a foundation for facilities.
stone-brick.name: Stone brick

stone-ore.description: A common ore. It is a raw material which can be also obtained from rocks.
stone-ore.name: Stone

storage-1.description: Used to store products, but the capacity is limited.
storage-1.name: Storage MK.I

storage-2.description: Has twice the capacity of a Storage Mk.I and requires steel to produce.
storage-2.name: Storage MK.II

storage-tank.description: The Storage Tank has a larger capacity than the Storage for storing fluid. When dismantling a non-empty Storage Tank any remaining fluid will be lost.
storage-tank.name: Storage tank

strange-matter-generator.description: Strange matter has a great gravitational negative pressure, which exceeds its energy density, so that the space around the strange matter is warped and meets the negative energy demand of the warp engine.
strange-matter-generator.name: Strange matter

sulphuric-acid.description: Primary chemical product. Produced from crude oil, can also be directly gathered from the sea of sulfuric acid with a water pump.
sulphuric-acid.name: Sulfuric acid

t-matrix.description: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, is the foundation of all scientific and technological research.
t-matrix.name: Electromagnetic matrix

terrain-tool.description: A surface leveling tool. Cannot use it to change the planetary landforms at will, can only level the surface to zero altitude. If you use the foundation for high ground, you will get soil pile; on the contrary, if you use the foundation for the ocean or low-lying areas, you must consume soil pile. When laying the foundation, you can choose a kind of decoration, or without decoration, only level the surface.
terrain-tool.name: Foundation

tesla-coil.description: The power transmission facility. Can extend the power supply range of the power grid with a certain connection length and supply area.
tesla-coil.name: Tesla tower

titan-crystal.description: Further, strengthen the lattice structure of titanium to form particular titanium atom crystal with higher strength by adding a precise proportion of organic crystals to titanium.
titan-crystal.name: Titanium crystal

titan-glass.description: When the glass is in a molten state, adding a certain proportion of titanium can greatly strengthen the glass and adapt to more intense environments.
titan-glass.name: Titanium glass

titanium-alloy.description: Under different temperatures, utilizing the characteristics of the titanium's lattice structure and adding precise proportions of alloying elements will produce a new type of alloy material that achieves a perfect balance of phase transition temperature and phase content. It has superior strength and toughness.
titanium-alloy.name: Titanium alloy

titanium-ore.description: Can form under the action of high-intensity heat with a  particular molecular structure.
titanium-ore.name: Titanium ore

titanium-plate.description: Obtained from smelting titanium ores, it is light in weight and high in strength. It is an indispensable raw material for producing high-strength materials.
titanium-plate.name: Titanium ingot

u-matrix.description: Includes everything, the final answer to the theory of everything, solving the ultimate mystery of the universe!
u-matrix.name: Universe matrix

vertical-launching-silo.description: Launch a small carrier rocket loaded with Dyson sphere components onto the Dyson sphere orbit to form nodes and frames.
vertical-launching-silo.name: Vertical launching silo

water.description: It can be obtained from a water pump and widely used in chemical production.
water.name: Water

water-pump.description: Facility used to collect liquid resources from an ocean, including water and sulfuric acid.
water-pump.name: Water pump

wind-turbine.description: The primary power facility. Can convert wind energy into electrical energy. The actual generation capacity is related to the planet's wind energy ratio.
wind-turbine.name: Wind turbine

wood.description: Ordinary fuel. Obtained from trees, has low energy.
wood.name: Log

tech1.description:
Welcome to the Dyson Sphere Program!
You will start from scratch with a small workshop, develop into a huge intergalactic industrial empire, and finally build the great miracle of the universe: The Dyson Sphere.
tech1.name: Dyson sphere program

tech1001.description: Maxwell's equations poetically describe electricity and magnetism intertwining. With a deeper understanding, machines can be created for acquiring and using electrical energy with high efficiency.
tech1001.name: Electromagnetism

tech1002.description: The Electromagnetic Matrix is the foundation of all technologies and one of the basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating. Use a Matrix Lab to create these matrices and use a separate lab for automating the research of new technologies.
tech1002.name: Electromagnetic matrix

tech1101.description: Through the use of electric and magnetic fields, plasma can be utilized more efficiently. Plasma Exciters are very stable and effective.
tech1101.name: High-efficiency plasma control

tech1102.description: Applying new knowledge of plasma technology enables efficient gathering and refining of Crude Oil which will rapidly facilitate industrial development.
tech1102.name: Plasma extract refining

tech1103.description: High-energy X-ray photocatalysis can crack refined oil into more hydrogen and process the byproducts into energetic graphite.
tech1103.name: X-ray cracking

tech1111.description: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating. Continue uploading the Energy Matrix to unlock more advanced energy technologies.
tech1111.name: Energy matrix

tech1112.description: With further development of cryo-technology hydrogen can be liquefied to make fuel rods for higher combustion efficiency. These higher energy Fuel Rods can greatly increase the mecha's fuel power generation.
tech1112.name: Hydrogen fuel rod

tech1113.description: A high efficiency engine that operates plasma jets at hyperspeed to create a strong counterforce which can drive logistics drones to transport cargo between planetary logistic stations.
tech1113.name: Thruster

tech1114.description: Advanced power devices, can drive logisitics vessel to transport goods among planets.
tech1114.name: Reinforced thruster

tech1120.description: This technology can encapsulate the fluid in the container, making transportation more convenient.
tech1120.name: Fluid storage encapsulation

tech1122.description: Processing refined oil and plastic with a new polymer synthesis technology will create a new material: Organic Crystal.
tech1122.name: Polymer chemical engineering

tech1123.description: To obtain a titanium spar with higher strength, you can strengthen the crystal lattice structure of the titanium atoms by mixing a precise proportion of organic crystal into the titanium.
tech1123.name: High-strength crystal

tech1124.description: The Structure Matrix is one of the basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating. Continue uploading these matrices to better understand the structure of matter and to unlock new technologies.
tech1124.name: Structure matrix

tech1125.description: Using the force of a strong electric field, a spatial ring crystal can be formed by the Coulomb repulsion between particles. In a weak, static magnetic field the Casimir effect can be observed.
tech1125.name: Casimir crystal

tech1126.description: Incorporating a specific proportion of titanium and organic crystals into molten glass can create high-strength Titanium Glass which is suitable for more complex industrial production.
tech1126.name: High-strength glass

tech1131.description: In the field of materials, the emergence of graphene is a great breakthrough. When one layer of graphene is stacked on top of another, rotated to a certain Magic Angle, superconductivity takes place.
tech1131.name: Applied superconductor

tech1132.description: Objects made of Carbon Nanotubes that are harder than diamond can maintain structural integrity better when subjected to greater pressure. This is very practical for industrial production that requires withstanding extremely high pressure.
tech1132.name: High-strength material

tech1133.description: Although it is profound and complicated, it is of great benefit to master particle control technology. Under certain conditions, particles can be made to have a certain regularity, making everything much easier to control.
tech1133.name: Particle control technology

tech1134.description: At a certain temperature it is possible to take advantage of the high vapor pressure ratio between liquid hydrogen and liquid deuterium. Deuterium can be fractionated from liquid hydrogen with a considerable separation efficiency.
tech1134.name: Deuterium fractionation

tech1141.description: Mastering the regularity of the probability change in the quantum transition process can execute a series of reverse interference to the wave function of the particle thereby increasing the certainty of its collapse. Making good use of this technology may be a good thing for cats.
tech1141.name: Wave function interference

tech1142.description: The construction of a Miniature Particle Collider requires advanced materials and a huge energy supply. It is expensive, but it is worth it.
tech1142.name: Miniature particle collider

tech1143.description: Under the powerful energy of deuterium fusion, iron vapor is compressed to an extremely small size which causes the quark's of the iron core to change and instantly degenerate into strange matter.
tech1143.name: Strange matter

tech1144.description: Energy generated from the destruction caused by colliding positive matter and antimatter can be output to the power grid more stably by containing the reaction inside of an annihilation constraint sphere. The high energy production of this technology makes the core radiation stable in the visible light band which causes the reaction to look like a burning sun.
tech1144.name: Artificial star

tech1145.description: When matter and antimatter meet, they annihilate and generate tremendous energy. So long as the annihilation process is controllable, we can steadily utilise the energy.
tech1145.name: Controlled annihilation reaction

tech1151.description: The invention of Accelerant is incredibly useful! Just spray it on cargo to substantially improve industrial production efficiency.
tech1151.name: Accelerant Mk.I

tech1152.description: If the accelerant MK.I is not fast enough for you, then try Accelerant MK.II!
tech1152.name: Accelerant Mk.II

tech1153.description: Accelerant MK. III greatly maximizes the production speed and has higher requirements for the design of the entire production line.
tech1153.name: Accelerant Mk.II

tech1201.description: The basic assembler uses traditional mechanical technology to process primary items into more advanced ones.
tech1201.name: Basic assembling processes

tech1202.description: The upgraded assembler has improved the production speed and can assemble items faster.
tech1202.name: High-speed assembling processes

tech1203.description: We can control the arrangement and combination of particles in 3D space from a more microscopic level using quantum printing technology, which maximizes production speed.
tech1203.name: Quantum printing technology

tech1302.description: Large-scale integrated circuit devices are very good at processing data and managing the procedure.
tech1302.name: Processor

tech1303.description: Quantum chip can interfere with the wave function during the quantum transition process according to the quantum state's Rabi oscillation, increasing the probability of particles appearing in some states.
tech1303.name: Quantum chip

tech1311.description: Microcrystalline components with semiconductive properties are the excellent materials for manufacturing processors.
tech1311.name: Semiconductor material

tech1312.description: Immediate and effective information transmission can greatly optimize the industrial production process. By uploading the Information Matrix to obtain more technologies, the information management of the automated production line can be improved.
tech1312.name: Information matrix

tech1401.description: The invention of the Smelter has greatly promoted the development of metallurgical technology. Using the smelter for automated smelting will improve production efficiency.
tech1401.name: Automatic metallurgy

tech1402.description: The development of the smelting process has given rise to ore purification technology, which can help to obtain purer and more advanced products.
tech1402.name: Smelting purification

tech1403.description: With a better understanding of lattice structure and improved refining technology, we can now use a more advanced method to smelt high-strength crystals.
tech1403.name: Crystal smelting

tech1411.description: Under extremely strict and controlled temperature conditions, using a smelter to smelt iron ingots will improve the crystal form of material further, producing better mechanical properties.
tech1411.name: Steel smelting

tech1412.description: Power generation facilities that use combustibles as fuel have a conversion rate between energy output and fuel consumed.
tech1412.name: Thermal power

tech1413.description: The Advancements in mining and smelting technology have made ore control easier. Titanium can now be mined and utilized.
tech1413.name: Titanium smelting

tech1414.description: Taking advantage of the characteristics of the lattice structure of titanium at different temperatures, adding precise proportions of alloy elements during the smelting process, will produce a new type of alloy material that has higher strength and toughness.
tech1414.name: High-strength titanium alloy

tech1415.description: Collect soil pile from above zero altitudes and use them to fill up the ocean to make the factory construction more convenient. Just rectify the surface will consume the foundation.
tech1415.name: Environment Modification

tech1416.description: By using a stellarator to confine high-temperature plasma, the new generation of controlled nuclear fusion technology can make use of Deuteron fuel rods, these technological breakthroughs promote the miniaturization of fusion reactors.
tech1416.name: Mini fusion power generation

tech1417.description: Research shows that a thermodynamic negative temperature flow can be generated if the quantum state of monopoles is filtered by Wave Function Interference Technology. Using this technology, the process of ores smelting or purification can be greatly accelerated.
tech1417.name: Plane-Filter Smelting Technology

tech1501.description: The sun continuously radiates energy outwards in the form of electromagnetic waves. By laying solar panels we can collect this radiant energy, but only a small part. We need a more efficient way.
tech1501.name: Solar collection

tech1502.description: The Photon Combiner can convert low-frequency photons into high-frequency, effectively reducing solar energy loss from solar radiation.
tech1502.name: Photon frequency conversion

tech1503.description: Use the <color="#FD965ECC">EM-Rail Ejector</color> to launch <color="#FD965ECC">Solar sails</color> to form a Dyson swarm to absorb radiation energy from the star more effectively.
tech1503.name: Solar sail orbit system

tech1504.description: Receiving the high-energy rays transmitted from the Dyson sphere and directly outputting energy to the power grid. Ray receiving efficiency will affect the energy obtained.
tech1504.name: Ray receiver

tech1505.description: With the Graviton lens, it can increase the ray receiver's maximum output power by utilizing the planetary ionosphere. Of course, the premise is that the planet has an atmosphere, or this technology is useless.
tech1505.name: Planetary ionosphere utilization

tech1506.description: During the research of the Dirac equation in reverse, it discovers that a large number of gamma rays can create an open string in a critical vibration state, and they will easily split into proton and antiproton pairs when they collide mutually. Mastering this technology will improve the ray receiver's efficiency, by storing the energy of stars as antimatter.
tech1506.name: Dirac inversion mechanism

tech1507.description: The Universe Matrix contains everything, matter, energy, and information. It turns out that these are all the same thing. It is the ultimate crystallization of the theory of everything, revealing the ultimate mystery of the universe.
tech1507.name: Universe matrix

tech1508.description: Congratulations! Builder of great civilizations! The primary mission of the Dyson Sphere Program has been successfully complete with your efforts. (The game will continue after completion)
tech1508.name: Mission completed!

tech1511.description: Use <color="#FD965ECC">Accumulator</color> to store the surplus electrical energy in the power grid. When the power supply is insufficient, the accumulator will automatically release the stored electric energy to maintain the factory operating.
tech1511.name: Energy storage

tech1512.description: Using the Energy Exchanger, the surplus electric energy in the grid can be made into a full accumulator, transported to another planet, and then released through the energy exchanger. Realize the transportation of electricity between planets.
tech1512.name: Interstellar power transmission

tech1521.description: Compared with the traditional structure, the new high-strength frame material is made of carbon nanotubes, which can withstand the strong gravitational force of stars.
tech1521.name: High-strength lightweight structure

tech1522.description: Use <color="#FD965ECC">Small Carrier Rocket</color> to launch the <color="#FD965ECC">Dyson sphere components</color> to form the Dyson sphere frames and nodes.
tech1522.name: Vertical launching silo

tech1523.description: As the latitude of the Dyson sphere nodes increases, its surface stress distribution will become more complicated and will be more difficult to maintain the balance of its stress system.
tech1523.name: Dyson sphere stress system

tech1601.description: Use the <color="#FD965ECC">Conveyor belt</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Sorter</color> to transport cargo from one place to another to achieve automated production.
tech1601.name: Basic logistics system

tech1602.description:
<color="#FD965ECC">Splitter</color> can diverge cargo or balance multiple conveyor belts, making the automated production lines more diverse.
Use TAB key to switch styles.
tech1602.name: Improved logistics system

tech1603.description: Sorter MK.III can sort cargo even faster, very useful when resources are in great demand.
tech1603.name: High-efficiency logistics system

tech1604.description: Transportation of materials around a planet can be realized through Planetary Logistics Stations and Logistics Drones after the materials technology reaches a certain level. The logistics drones will automatically transport the items after the supply-demand data is setup.
tech1604.name: Planetary logistics system

tech1605.description: The magnificent space elevator realizes more convenient transportation of materials between planets.
tech1605.name: Interstellar logistics system

tech1606.description: Gas giants contain abundant resources, and the exploitation of Gas giants marks a new level of technology.
tech1606.name: Gas giants exploitation

tech1701.description: Unlocks the basic power system component: Electric Motor.
tech1701.name: Electromagnetic drive

tech1702.description: The magnetic force generated by the electromagnetic turbine can make objects levitate against gravity.
tech1702.name: Magnetic levitation technology

tech1703.description: When material technology reaches a certain level, the particles can be binded by devices. Particles can also be guided to show certain properties.
tech1703.name: Magnetic particle trap

tech1704.description: The Graviton Lens made of strange matter can produce a particular range of spatial distortion near the lens through ingenious design, which will refract the passing graviton.
tech1704.name: Gravitational wave refraction

tech1705.description: One of the basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, through the study of the Gravity Matrix, finally reconciled Quantum Field Theory and General Relativity.
tech1705.name: Gravity matrix

tech1711.description: Generating high-intensity and stable artificial magnetic fields is very difficult, but it is crucial for developing other advanced technologies. Mastering super magnetic field technology is essential in the development of technology.
tech1711.name: Super magnetic field generator

tech1712.description: Using the powerful magnetic field excited by the super-magnetic ring, there is a longer power transmission distance and a larger supply area.
tech1712.name: Satellite power distribution system

tech2901.description: Double-press <color="#FD965ECC">Space</color> to lift off, and the mecha will increase the move speed by <color="#FD965ECC">150%</color> in low-altitude flight mode, flying will consume a lot of energy.
tech2901.name: Drive engine

tech2902.description: Double-press <color="#FD965ECC">Space</color> to lift off. Hold <color="#FD965ECC">Arrow keys</color> with <color="#FD965ECC">Space</color> in flight mode, which will activate sail mode at a certain altitude. In sail mode, mecha will orbit the planet at a higher speed.
tech2902.name: Drive engine

tech2903.description: Increase the max sail speed of the mecha in space, but it will greatly increase energy consumption.
tech2903.name: Drive engine

tech2904.description: Using the <color="#FD965ECC">CapsLock</color> key to switch on a warp, each time activate the warp will consume <color="#FD965ECC">Space warper</color> x 1.
tech2904.name: Drive engine

tech2905.description:
Increase the Max Warp Speed of the mecha in space, but it will greatly increase energy consumption. 
Use [<color="#FD965ECC">SHIFT</color>], [<color="#FD965ECC">S</color>] to control the warp speed.
tech2905.name: Drive engine

tech2906.description:
